Publication Title: A genetic mosaic mouse model illuminates the pre-malignant progression of basal-like breast cancer
Publication Keywords: BRCA1, Basal-like Breast Cancer, Pre-malignancy, Mouse Genetic Mosaic Model, Spatiotemporal Analysis Of Tumor Initiation
Publication Authors: Jianhao Zeng, Shambhavi Singh, Xian Zhou, Ying Jiang, Eli Casarez, Kristen A Atkins, Kevin A Janes, Hui Zong
Publication Abstract: Basal-like breast cancer (BLBC) is highly aggressive, and often characterized by BRCA1 and p53 deficiency. Although conventional mouse models enabled the investigation of BLBC at malignant stages, its initiation and pre-malignant progression remain understudied.
